Class StorageUtils

      • getValidFile

        public static java.io.File getValidFile(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String filePath,
                                        boolean isPublic)
        Get a valid file of a given file path.
        Parameters:
        context - a Context instance
        filePath - the original file path
        isPublic - if true, the valid path will be in external storage (sdcard); if false, the valid path will be in internal storage.
        Returns:
        the valid file

      • getRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String getRelativePath(java.io.File file,
                                               java.io.File folder)
        Get the relative path from a file to a directory. returns null if the file doesn't belong to the folder.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to get relative path to.
        folder - the directory to get relative path from.
        Returns:
        the relative path, or null if the file doesn't belong to the folder.
